analysis.intraday_levels: SPY: $675 support (11k OI), $670 put wall major support. Resistance at $685 (19k OI), $688 call wall. QQQ: $610 put wall critical support (0.4% away), resistance at $621 call wall (1.4% away). /ES: 6825 and 6813-6815 support per Twitter
